name: I Want To Be a Beer!
name_original: I Want To Be a Beer!
description:
This game will show you the complicated process of brewing beer through a series of worlds and levels that illustrate the ingredients and key steps needed to craft a (delicious) beer.

You'll start your journey as a simple grain of barley. Make your way through this challenging 2D Platformer and embrace the changes that will come along the way.

I Want To Be a Beer! Is in early access. Current features are:

- 3 worlds, for a total of 15 levels.

- Smooth hip-hop background music.

- Charming art style and hand-drawn animations.

We will be updating this project frequently, and are curently working on:

- MORE levels.

- New game mechanics related to specific agents or interactions during the brewing process.

- Animated cutscenes between worlds.

- Secret worlds, unlockable by beating levels under a certain amount of time.

- Death counter. Related to secret worlds as well.

- And many more!

Feedback is hugely appreciated! Consider answering our Overall User Experience form, and let us know if you'd like to test some future versions.

I Want To Be A Beer! - Overall User Experience.

Donations are hugely appreciated as well, thank you for your support!
